summary.winner: Radiance Revive Advanced Vitamin C Serum
summary.key_differences: Radiance Revive Advanced Vitamin C Serum offers a more potent and hydrating formula, while GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is more budget-friendly and suitable for oily skin types.

recommendation: Choose GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum for budget-conscious consumers looking for an affordable, gentle, and daily-use vitamin C serum, and choose Radiance Revive Advanced Vitamin C Serum for consumers seeking a premium, hydrating, and intense brightening formula.
